text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Trump's Rx for coronavirus: literally toxic.
"Developments in US’s elect-your-id experiment, as shining city upon a hill runs up against that age-old political question: Quis custodiet ipsos custodes...Latin for “who lung-bleaches the lung bleachers?” https://t.co/C61HkYjRUP
